doc.field: Swedish Match AB SMBS.ST> said it was selling one of its Portuguese subsidiaries, Sociedade de Iniciativa e Aproveitamentos Florestais Sarl> (SIAF), to the Porto-based Sonae Group> for an undisclosed price. SIAF, a subsidiary of Swedish Match since 1946, had a turnover last year of 62 mln crowns, the Swedish group said in a statement. REUTER
